body:
So I was going through my recent discussions and found this. I wanted to bring this up again.

What the title says
put down what you think

Keep the Speed. Get rid of fire resistance it is useless. Change it with like a different but usable potion like Night vision. With night vision you will be able to see underground better. (Same points as speed and level)

Nebula shop is in need of Blocks like 16 wood logs and 32 glass (on most maps I keep running out of blocks.
(Wood = 3 points glass = 2 level 1)

Make the spanky spade knockback 2 (30 points level 30) add a spanky spade Jr which is iron knockback 1 (10 points level 10) 

Keep the gold apples

Change the flame torch to like magma cream(therefore u can't accidentally place it and loose the enchants) The name would be Flame Orb

Arrows are good but on Venomous TDM I'm sure it should be removed for that map

Put down what you think
If there is any other items in the Nebula I forgot reply to it and i add it here.  


In Total my nebula shop would be:

3GoldApples(Same level/points)
Speed Potion(Splash and Drink) same level/points 
NightVision (Splash and Drink) same level/points as speed
Jukebox/Disc(Same Level and Points)
16 Wood Logs (Level 1) 3 points
32 Glass (Level 1) 3 points
SpankySpade(knockback 2) level 30/30 points
SpankySpade JR(Knockback 1) level 10/10 points
Flame Orb(FireAspect1) Same level/points as Flaming Torch
Arrow(16x) same level/points
Arrow(64x) Same level/points
Snowballs(16x) Level  1 - Same amount of Points

title: Nebula Shop(Tweaks and Changes) -MyIdeas

replies.body: Instead of the golden apples being 8 points, make it more like 4-6
replies.body_tagged: Instead of the golden apples being 8 points, make it more like 4-6

replies.body: You should be able to purchase 2 golden apples for 4 points.
replies.body_tagged: You should be able to purchase 2 golden apples for 4 points.

replies.body: I liek da arrows in oitn doe XD

replies.body: +1 and Could you sell apples ? it would need a cool down time doe

replies.body:
I like it, but night vision is kinda useless for people who have gamma set to 10 in he options.

@Ray_Sybrandy they used to have apples, and the reason they were removed was because on maps like Senex II and Castle Adventure, you could craft a god apple.

replies.body: Add in something like a resistance 1 potion or a regen 1 potion
